question: Which of the following practice was not followed by the Indus people?
option1: Worship of trees, animals and birds
option2: Worship of idols of different gods
option3: Belief in ghosts and evil spirits
option4: Belief in life hereafter as suggested by the burial practices of the rich
answer: Worship of idols of different gods
explanation:
People of Indus valley civilization were followed following beliefs and practices:
  • Worship of trees, animals and birds
  • Belief in ghosts and evil spirits
  • Belief in life hereafter as suggested by the burial practices of the rich
